content: stitches from left to right at the first red row below the belt do not knit row 1 p row 2 k1 kfb to end of row row 3 p row 4-11 st-st row 12 k with white fun fur row 13 bind off with white fun fur with wrong side showing sew a running stitch across cast on stitches for shoes using black yarn pull up tight and fasten sew leg seams together and stop at belt make sure when sewing back pants seam not to pick up skirt stitches sew head seams together stop at first red row of the shirt this leaves an opening in the center of the back for stuffing turn body right side out and then sew the skirt seam now stuff and complete as santa finish face as santa without the beard of course add a small stitch for the mouth in pink hair can be added by making small curls with white yarn 2 stitches above the eyes and several curls on each side of the head slant side curls down from front to back this will give the hat a better fit finish by sewing on the hat as for santa page 5 warning- copyright © 2020 all patterns designed by debra alling are protected any unauthorized copying will constitute an infringement of copyright all rights reserved
